word_mean: 便秘：很少排便或排便困难
粪便干燥坚硬，排出困难，排便次数减少的表现。
以大便秘结为主要表现的疾病。

sentence.Network_en: Try to make sure your bowel motions are regular and that you avoid any constipation.
sentence.Network_cn: 尽量保证大便规律，避免便秘。

sentence.Network_en: Some foods bind the bowels / are binding , ie cause constipation.
sentence.Network_cn: 有些食物容易引起便秘.

sentence.Network_en: Which of the following living habits helps to reduce constipation?
sentence.Network_cn: 以下哪一种生活环境能减少便秘?

list.abs: 慢性便秘(chronic constipation) 是临床常见病和多发病。近年来,西医制定了慢性便秘的诊疗标准与指南[1 ,2 ] ,而作为中医药治疗优势.
小结节性肝硬化micronodular cirrhosis习惯性便秘habitual constipation马维综合征Mallory-Weiss syndrome(retching erosion).
MAL AU VENTRE 肚疼la constipation 便密DIARRHE 拉肚子/ 腹泻
...症状会自然消失，在此过程中应避免人工协助排便，以免养成婴儿排便对人工的依赖性，而失去自主排便的信心。2.功能性便秘(functional constipation)：虽然排便困难是儿科门珍的常见症状，但对功能性便秘与功能性便潴留尚难以鉴别，脑瘫患儿容易发生功能性便秘.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (in the sense 'contraction of body tissues'): from late Latin constipatio(n-), from the verb constipare (see constipate)

entry.def: Constipation is a medical condition which causes people to have difficulty getting rid of solid waste from their body.

means.word_mean: 1. irregular and infrequent or difficult evacuation of the bowels; can be a symptom of intestinal obstruction or diverticulitis
2. the act of making something futile and useless (as by routine)
